com.dragonboatrace.tools

Class Lane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dragonboatrace.tools.Lane

  • public class Lane
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Lane in a Race.
    Author:
    Benji Garment, Joe Wrieden

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Hitbox area
      The hit box of the lane, used to check if a boat is in the lane.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles
      A list of the obstacles currently in the lane.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> randomWaitTimes
      A list of times to wait before adding a new obstacle to the lane.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lane(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos, int width, int round)
      Creates a new lane at a position and with a width and uses the round number to change the number of obstacles.

    • Field Detail

      • area

        private final Hitbox area
        The hit box of the lane, used to check if a boat is in the lane.

      • obstacles

        private final java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles
        A list of the obstacles currently in the lane.

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> randomWaitTimes
        A list of times to wait before adding a new obstacle to the lane.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lane

        public Lane(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos,
            int width,
            int round)
        Creates a new lane at a position and with a width and uses the round number to change the number of obstacles.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the lane in the screen.
        width - The width of the lane.
        round - The current round, used to increase difficulty.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

      • getHitbox

        public Hitbox getHitbox()
        Get the lanes hit box
        Returns:
        A Hitbox representing the lanes area.

      • getObstacles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> getObstacles()
        Get the list of all obstacles in the lane.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of type Obstacle with all the obstacles in the lane.

      • populateList

        private void populateList(int round)
        Fill the list with obstacles that will start at random times.
        Parameters:
        round - The current round increases the number of obstacles.

      • randomObstacle

        private Obstacle randomObstacle()
        Create a new random Obstacle
        Returns:
        a new Obstacle in the lanes area.

      • removeObstacle

        public void removeObstacle(Obstacle toRemove)
        Remove an Obstacle from the list of obstacles, and randomly replace it.
        Parameters:
        toRemove - The obstacle to remove from the lane.

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Render the obstacles in the lane.
        Parameters:
        batch - The SpriteBatch to be added to.

      • replaceObstacle

        public void replaceObstacle()
        Create a random time at which to add an Obstacle to the lane.

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime,
                   float velY)
        Update the obstacles in the lane, remove any that are no longer on screen and replace them at a random time.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time since the last frame.
        velY - The y-velocity of the boat in the lane.
